head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths VOLIN, MAURICE F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths VOLIN, MAURICE F.

block.p: VOLIN-Maurice F. Suddenly, on September 9. Of Boca Raton, FL, and Lenox, MA, and formerly of Oceanside, NY. Beloved husband of Claire S. Volin, and beloved father of James J. Volin of New York, NY, Rochelle B. Suflas of Moorestown, NJ, and Nancy Volin Simon of New York, NY, dear brother of Irwin Volin and Robert Volin and cherished grandfather of three grandchildren. Graveside services will be held on Monday, September 11, at 1 PM in Mt. Hebron Cemetery, Flushing, NY.

VOLIN-Maurice F. Suddenly, on September 9. Of Boca Raton, FL, and Lenox, MA, and formerly of Oceanside, NY. Beloved husband of Claire S. Volin, and beloved father of James J. Volin of New York, NY, Rochelle B. Suflas of Moorestown, NJ, and Nancy Volin Simon of New York, NY, dear brother of Irwin Volin and Robert Volin and cherished grandfather of three grandchildren. Graveside services will be held on Monday, September 11, at 1 PM in Mt. Hebron Cemetery, Flushing, NY.
